creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
inscription:
waka by O_tomo no Kuronushi
Kagami-yama
Iza tachi yorite 
Mite yukan
Toshi he nuru mi wa
Oi yashi nuru to
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Second Series of Disguse as the Six Immortal Poets
title: No. 2 Courtesan as Ōtomo no Kuronushi
